events.name: A track start playing
events.description: Triggered when a track starts playing on Spotify.

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: The ID of the track that starts playing.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the device playing the track.

events.name: A track is paused/stopped
events.description: Triggered when a track is paused or stopped on Spotify.

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: The ID of the track that is paused or stopped.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the device where the track is paused or stopped.

events.name: Pause a track
events.description: Pause the currently playing track on Spotify.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The ID of the device where the track should be paused.

events.name: Add track to a playlist
events.description: Add a track to a specific Spotify playlist.

parameters.name: track_id
parameters.description: The ID of the track to add.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The ID of the playlist to which the track should be added.
